name: 13 Doors Escape Games - start a puzzle challenge
name_original: 13 Doors Escape Games - start a puzzle challenge
description:
Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles.

----------------------------------------------------------

'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Can You Escape The House 3 - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Can You Escape The House 3 - a cool escape game?

Escape Game: 13 Doors is another point and click escape game. Try to unlock all 13 doors in this 13 doors escape game. Find clues and solve puzzles to open the doors and escape from the rooms. Have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
